title: Associate Consultant - EPM Practice
tagsAndSkills: anaplan,hyperion financial management,project management,epm,hyperion essbase,forecasting,balanced scorecard,hfm
jobDescription:
Astral Consulting Ltd is looking for Associate Consultant - EPM Practice to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • As an Associate Consultant in the Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) Practice, you will play a crucial role in implementing EPM solutions for clients
  • This role involves collaborating with clients, understanding their business needs, and contributing to the design and deployment of EPM systems to enhance their financial planning, budgeting, and reporting processes

Key Responsibilities:

  • Client Engagement:Engage with clients to understand their business requirements and financial processes
  • Collaborate with clients to gather and analyze data related to performance management
  • Solution Design:Contribute to the design and configuration of EPM solutions based on client needs
  • Work closely with senior consultants to translate business requirements into technical specifications
  • System Implementation:Assist in the implementation and deployment of EPM systems
  • Configure software applications and modules to meet client specifications
  • Testing and Quality Assurance:Conduct testing activities to ensure the accuracy and functionality of EPM solutions
  • Work with project teams to identify and resolve issues during testing phases
  • Training and Documentation:Provide training sessions to end-users on the usage and functionality of EPM systems
  • Create documentation, including user manuals and training materials
  • Client Support:Offer ongoing support to clients during and after the implementation phase
  • Address and resolve issues or inquiries related to EPM systems
  • Collaboration:Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including finance, IT, and project management
  • Work closely with senior consultants and project managers to ensure project success
  • Continuous Learning:Stay updated on industry trends, advancements in EPM technologies, and best practices
  • Participate in training programs to enhance technical and consulting skills
  • Client Relationship Building:Build and maintain positive relationships with clients
  • Understand client business processes to offer valuable insights and recommendations
  • Project Reporting:Contribute to project reporting, including status updates, timelines, and milestones
  • Provide regular updates to project managers and clients
